name: Overview

[{"id":"588d1da1-5790-4aa0-8076-d1966031d930","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4486ddc5-6ef3-47b9-88e7-43dfd17e5a69","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is a data structure used to represent a single source file or logical module within the Jarvis analysis system. It serves as a container for metadata, linking a physical file on disk to the functional components (methods and functions) contained within it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"15f4de3d-45eb-411d-8e86-77520d0c45cd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"While the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" orchestrates the entire project, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class focuses on the internal structure of an individual file.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6703b302-ed6b-412b-b1a2-da98d3619f51","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"dfcf6f65-0dbb-4704-8b3e-40083bb9f62c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7ce86a1f-83ff-474e-832a-3206e364daa3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The fully qualified name or namespace of the module (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""api.v1.auth"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7f1767e0-4517-4ef7-8d0b-e833712355de","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"filename","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The absolute path to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file associated with this module.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0852d698-5128-47b6-aec2-234ef53c8d12","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"methods","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dict","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A registry of functions and methods defined within the module. Each entry stores metadata about the function's location in the source code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aa24f032-c36b-4324-bb8a-5ed341c77066","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"fc7bef05-c7ca-418b-9c62-8561f861bc14","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a7ab7afb-b87d-4e07-af3e-304b37dc28d0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__(name, filename)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes a new module instance. It sets up the primary identifiers and creates an empty dictionary to store method information.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5818b461-7da7-47e8-bc7e-fc98ff90d3f5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_name()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves the module's namespace identifier.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8cc0afbe-e5fd-4fb0-a515-d6e7e499e27c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_filename()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves the file path. This is used when the analyzer needs to open the file to read source code or generate AST nodes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"113725e2-cbb5-4175-920b-80aeff87234d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_methods()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Returns the dictionary of all registered methods. Each method entry typically includes the name, start line, and end line.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"06f5662a-f63a-458f-872e-845b2a94f760","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_method(method, first=None, last=None)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers a function or method definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"3fded9b7-3aff-4ea6-878d-e982dc37aa50","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"method","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The name of the function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2081933f-0347-4ad9-97eb-0bb0f7246a92","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"first","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The line number where the function definition starts.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bcb7d06f-6648-478e-b1a4-73bf8f733c99","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"last","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The line number where the function ends.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4cdb71b8-31cf-42ca-88fc-4a3985f11748","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It will not overwrite a method if it is already registered, ensuring the integrity of the initial analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"058b6194-7b3e-459c-bc5c-ec49ec037f9c","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"48311b4f-e03c-40e2-9134-f80b186ca0aa","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3373154f-7fec-4c4e-adfd-169d922dab85","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is used to map out the contents of a file so that the analyzer knows where to find specific pieces of logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b6fe4572-6bf3-433d-8513-4895e836329c","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"from modules import Module

# 1. Create a module representation
auth_mod = Module("app.auth", "/src/app/auth.py")

# 2. Add methods found during AST traversal
# login() spans lines 10 to 25
auth_mod.add_method("login", first=10, last=25)
# logout() spans lines 27 to 30
auth_mod.add_method("logout", first=27, last=30)

# 3. Accessing metadata
methods = auth_mod.get_methods()
login_info = methods.get("login")
print(f"Function 'login' is located between lines {login_info['first']} and {login_info['last']}.")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"12ce1fa3-d695-4bab-afed-1d4c310a5a48","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"035b4309-f587-4d69-a3de-a4947f260ccd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Source Mapping","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By storing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"first","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"last","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" line numbers, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class allows the analysis engine to calculate the "scope" of a function. This is critical for determining which variables belong to which function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de71c691-9c5c-4f6e-bd2e-ea2b6f39b504","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Lazy Identification","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"methods","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" dictionary allows the system to build a map of a file's capabilities without having to store the entire source code in memory. It only keeps the coordinates needed to find the code later.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1089155a-53f6-447c-94fb-d688fa71f7f4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Encapsulation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This class keeps the logic of "what's inside this file" separate from "how this file relates to others," which is managed by the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ModuleManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6b4e2a41-df3b-44eb-8209-0f83d87a2061","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
